result.title: Receiving Wrong Answer during submission C++ Contest #308(Div 2) B
result.content:
This is in regard to the question:

http://codeforces.com/contest/552/problem/B

When I manually run the test cases on my pc (or on ideone.com) it shows correct answer for the test case input which is (100). Answer is 192. You can find my code at

http://ideone.com/AZc19G

But it is showing Wrong Answer on the Codeforces Complier as the Answer is coming out to be 195. I am unable to figure out the reason behind this anomaly. I dont have an uninitialized varaible. Kindly help if you are able to figure out the error. Thanks in advance.
